Achievement %c[guide_blue]«Bookworm»%c[default] requires to open all the information in your personal PDA.
 
%c[guide_green]Information%c[default]
 
Information can be opened by talking to important characters, downloading data from storage devices or copying information from personal diaries.
 
%c[guide_green]%c[default]
 
All founded flash drives will be replaced by a rare PDA with information.
 
When adding new articles (When updating the mod), this achievement will be reset and flash drives can be retrieved again.

Achievement %c[guide_blue]«Perfectionist»%c[default] requires to unlock all the achievements in the Zone.
 
%c[guide_green]Reward%c[default]
 
Doubles the number of rank points.

Achievement %c[guide_blue]«Black Hawk Down»%c[default] requires to destroy 3 helicopters with small arms, or only one with a grenade launcher (RPG-7 or RG-6).
 
%c[guide_green]Reward%c[default]
 
Mi-24 «Lan» helicopters will be replaced later by weaker helicopters, Mi-2 «Hoplit».

Achievement %c[guide_blue]«Pioneer»%c[default] is only available in story mode and requires that you turn off both the «Miracle Machine» and the «Brain Burner».
 
%c[guide_green]Reward%c[default]
 
Travel through "Yantar" and "Radar" became much easier now, when their psi-fields were turned off.

Achievement %c[guide_blue]«Geologist»%c[default] requires detection of at least 50 artifacts.
 
%c[guide_green]Information%c[default]
 
To detect an artifact, a detector is required, which is sold by most traders. You can detect artifacts using the detector near an anomaly.
 
%c[guide_green]Reward%c[default]
 
The spawn rate of artifacts in anomalies will be slightly increased.

Achievement %c[guide_blue]«A wealthy client»%c[default] requires that you have 1,000,000 RUs at any time.
 
%c[guide_green]Reward%c[default]
 
Most traders will start offering you special products.

Achievement %c[guide_blue]«Informant»%c[default] requires that you provide a minimum of 50 PDAs to information merchants.
 
%c[guide_green]Information%c[default]
 
PDA can be found on the bodies of dead stalkers, and they can be exchanged from the information merchants, just inform them that you have information to sell.
 
%c[guide_green]Reward%c[default]
 
Traders will offer you a slightly higher reward for any PDA that you brought to them.

Achievement %c[guide_blue]«Technical Excellence»%c[default] requires that you deliver all 3 tool sets to one technician.
 
%c[guide_green]Information%c[default]
 \Ordinary tools for fine and rough work can be found mostly in stashes, but they can also be found by compliting some stalkers tasks.
 
%c[guide_green]Reward%c[default]
 
Techniques and sewing kits will repair weapons and equipment slightly more than before.

Achievement %c[guide_blue]«Legendary stalker»%c[default] requires that you reach the highest possible rank.
 
%c[guide_green]Information%c[default]
 
The rank can be obtained through almost all the actions that you can take in the Zone.
An article describing the rank and how it works can be found in the category of functions.
 
%c[guide_green]Reward%c[default]
 
You will be able to hire 2 additional stalkers as companions above your current limit.

Achievement %c[guide_blue]«Marked One»%c[default] requires to survive 25 psi-storms and 25 blowouts.
 
%c[guide_green]Information%c[default]
 
Blowouts and psi storms occur at random intervals that can be changed through the weather parameters section in the main menu.
 
Both of these functions can be switched at any time during the trek, but should be included so you can get this Achievement.
 
%c[guide_green]Reward%c[default]
 
There is a small chance of surviving during a emission or psi storm, outside the shelter.

Achievement %c[guide_blue]«Detective»%c[default] requires to found at least 100 stashes.
 
%c[guide_green]Information%c[default]
 
Stashes can be found almost anywhere in the Zone at any time, but getting their coordinates after performing tasks will mark them on your map.
 
%c[guide_green]Reward%c[default]
 
The maximum number of items that can be found in future stashes will be slightly increased.

Achievement %c[guide_blue]«Any last word?»%c[default] requires to kill 500 stalkers or to make surrender 50 stalkers.
 
%c[guide_green]Information%c[default]
 
The requirements for this achievement are likely to be met while traveling through the Zone, but if you intentionally try to unlock it, be careful not to kill neutral or friendly stalkers if you value your reputation.
 
%c[guide_green]Reward%c[default]
 
Captive stalkers can sometimes give you the coordinates of an additional stash.

Achievement %c[guide_blue]«Seeker»%c[default] requires that you visit all locations in the Zone.
 
%c[guide_green]Reward%c[default]
 
You will receive the coordinates of three unique stashes.

Achievement %c[guide_blue]«Explorer»%c[default] requires that you explore all areas on Zone locations.
 
%c[guide_green]Reward%c[default]
 
You will receive the coordinates of five unique stashes.

Achievement %c[guide_blue]«Mutant slayer»%c[default] requires killing 500 mutants, or collecting 250 parts of mutants.
 
%c[guide_green]Reward%c[default]
 
Sometimes you can get additional parts of the mutant.

Achievement %c[guide_blue]«Destroyer of the Legends»%c[default] available only in story mode and requires that you defeat the Wish-Granter.
 
%c[guide_green]Reward%c[default]
 
You will receive a significant increase in both your rank and reputation.
